title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 935.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 935.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The designated waters are located as shown on Map 1, section
935.7, infra, and as contained
within the topographical or basin limit line on the reproduced topographical
reference maps in section
935.9, infra. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
935.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
